text: "The Universal" is a 1995 song by Blur and is the second single from their fourth studio album The Great Escape. It went to number 5 in the United Kingdom and Scotland and number 12 in Ireland and Iceland. ==Track listings== All music was composed by Albarn, Coxon, James, and Rowntree. All lyrics were written by Albarn. * UK CD1 and Australian CD single # "The Universal" – 4:00 # "Ultranol" – 2:42 # "No Monsters in Me" – 3:38 # "Entertain Me" (The Live It! remix) – 7:19 * UK CD2: The Universal II – Live at the BBC # "The Universal" – 4:11 # "Mr Robinson's Quango" – 4:17 # "It Could Be You" – 3:17 # "Stereotypes" – 3:12 * UK cassette single and European CD single # "The Universal" – 3:53 # "Entertain Me" (The Live It! remix) – 7:14 * Japanese CD single # "The Universal" – 4:00 # "It Could Be You" (live at the BBC) – 3:17 # "Stereotypes" (live at the BBC) – 3:12 # "Entertain Me" (The Live It! remix) – 7:19 ==References== Category:1995 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Blur (band) songs
title: The Universal
